Educator, Web Media
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-event-details', templateUrl: './event-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./event-details.component.css'] }) export class EventDetailsComponent { GuestArray = [ { name: 'Lisa Alvin' , designation: 'Co-founder', company: 'Meetup'}, { name: 'Jenny Pick' , designation: 'CEO', company: 'Zack'}, { name: 'Peter Scott' , designation: 'CEO', company: 'Scott Inc'}, ] }
